CustomField.description: Creates a short form (MMM YYYY) of Schedule Date
CustomField.formula: Case(MONTH(Schedule_Date__c), 1, "Jan " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 2, "Feb " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 3, "Mar " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 4, "Apr " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 5, "May " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 6, "Jun " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 7, "Jul " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 8, "Aug " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 9, "Sep " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 10, "Oct " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 11, "Nov " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), 12, "Dec " + Text(YEAR(Schedule_Date__c)), "")
CustomField.label: Date
